excerpt: "Elon Musk has made a rare new comment about Tesla’s now not-so-secret ‘Dojo’ program to create an AI-training supercomputer and gave a hint of its capacity. Last year at Tesla’s Autonomy Day, the CEO first confirmed the existence of the ‘Dojo’ program: “We do have a major program at Tesla which we don’t have enough time"
